values:
O, Crystal,
I wish I was there to give you a hug and tell you it is going to be okay. 
I know a year has gone by snice you last saw your mom in her earthly form. I know greive is different for everyone.
But remember she is totaly free from pain, suffering, and has a totaly new body, and is so enjoying worshiping with her Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. 

Write me about your nightmares. I may be able to sheild some light on them. 

Love ya 
Marilyn
I have not been online much to write but tonight I could not sleep.  My mind is thinking about this thursday and what this day will forever hold.  My mom died and my nightmares will not end.

I had a great weekend with you at your place last weekend. 

On Wednesday, I had a doctor's appointmnet to get some results back from blood tests taken two weeks ago. I knew he was going to tell me how my choclestol was way to high, but was unprepared for the next bit of news. I have diabetes and don't know what type as of yet as my family doctor is trying to get me in to see a specialist.

On Thursday, I was feeling not very well. So my mom took me into the hospital.(I had a very quite male nurse, but he wore a wedding ring). ---Crystal, I don't think I have any more blood to give. He took 4 beer bottle size of bottles plus 6 little tubes. Just to come back and tell me my white cells are up, but they can not find a reason for that.

I feel very much like that song Emotional girl. 
Please keep the above to yourself and just keep me in your prayers.
Marilyn

Crystal,
How are ya doing? It seems so long since we have had a good conversation. 
I hope this first Mother's day without your mom must be the hardest for ya. Just know I am thinking of you and my prayers are with you. 
What are you doing May 24? 
I will call ya sometime this week.
Marilyn

I am so stressed out. I did receive your message, but have been way to busy studying to call back.

How is the job search going? Any leads or interviews?

What kind of insurance did u get?

How was scrapbooking, yesterday?

Crystal, 
What happen last night? Did ya have to hut-down your computer? 
Anyways, I hope you are having a great time with Kristin. For we have the best reason to celebrate this holida, He is Risen. He is Risen indeed.
Everything ok with ya?
Mar
P.s. did ya know my picture can be found on a towel?

Crystal,
I am not to sure about the workings of this program or site. I have been answering every single one of your entries, but as a commitment. I did not know any other way to answer. Sorry.
I have had a very, very stressful past week and a very stressful weekend. 
Everything is coming do at once, teacher screwing up on the writing of theory part of a midterm, majour project due for Excel, and last but not least my Uncle's funeral yesterday, which has wiped me out.
My dad has not been himself, this week. ( which has added to my burdens,, too.
Well, got to run and do some work before Church.
Marilyn
